DataHubSearchConfig.description: Configuration for how any given field should be indexed and matched in the DataHub search index.

fieldName.description: Name of the field in the search index. Defaults to the field name otherwise

fieldType.description: Type of the field. Defines how the field is indexed and matched

queryByDefault.description: Whether we should match the field for the default search query

enableAutocomplete.description: Whether we should use the field for default autocomplete

addToFilters.description: Whether or not to add field to filters.

addHasValuesToFilters.description:
Whether or not to add the "has values" to filters.
check if this is conditional on addToFilters being true

hasValuesFilterNameOverride.description: Display name of the has values filter

boostScore.description: Boost multiplier to the match score. Matches on fields with higher boost score ranks higher

hasValuesFieldName.description: If set, add a index field of the given name that checks whether the field exists

numValuesFieldName.description: If set, add a index field of the given name that checks the number of elements

weightsPerFieldValue.description: (Optional) Weights to apply to score for a given value

fieldNameAliases.description: (Optional) Aliases for this given field that can be used for sorting etc.
